name: @sveltejs-labs/chart.js
description: Create charts using Chart.js in Svelte applications.
readme: # @sveltejs-labs/chart.js Svelte wrapper for [chart.js](https://www.chartjs.org/) Open for PRs and contributions! [![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/@sveltejs-labs%2Fchart.js.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/@sveltejs-labs%2Fchart.js) ![NPM Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/%40sveltejs-labs%2Fchart.js) ## Install Install this library with peer dependencies: ```shell bun add @sveltejs-labs/chart.js chart.js # or pnpm add @sveltejs-labs/chart.js chart.js # or yarn add @sveltejs-labs/chart.js chart.js # or npm i @sveltejs-labs/chart.js chart.js ``` ## Usage ```svelte ``` ### Custom Size In order for Chart.js to obey the custom size you need to set `maintainAspectRatio` to false, example: ```svelte ``` ## License Read [LICENSE.md](LICENSE.md)
